title: Daddy’s Boy!
description: The 1938 famously unfinished musical presented by Harrison von Harrison Jr.
quote: Daddy’s boy! He’s got a daddy that he brings such joy!
altHero: black and white classic film: a young sailor walks arm in arm with an older fancy gentleman
alt1: a sailor sings against a ship railing in between a man and woman
alt2: still on a boat, the older gentleman in top hat and tails
alt3: the sailor sings atop a set of stairs
alt4: the sailor, older gentleman, and even older man sing together
